 40/***********************************************************************
 41  Declarations
 42***********************************************************************/
 43
 44namespace vsip
 45{
 46
 47namespace impl
 48{
 49
 50// List of implementation tags to consider for LU.
 51
 52typedef Make_type_list<
 53#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_HAVE_CVSIP
 54  Cvsip_tag,
 55#endif
 56#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_HAVE_SAL
 57  Mercury_sal_tag,
 58#endif
 59#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_CBE_SDK
 60  Cml_tag,
 61#endif
 62#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_HAVE_LAPACK
 63  Lapack_tag,
 64#endif
 65  None_type // None_type is treated specially by Make_type_list, it is
 66            // not put into the list.  Putting an explicit None_type
 67            // at the end of the list lets us put a ',' after each impl
 68            // tag.
 69  >::type Lud_type_list;
 70
 71
 72
 73// a structure to chose implementation type
 74template <typename T>
 75struct Choose_lud_impl
 76{
 77#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 78  typedef Cvsip_tag use_type;
 79  typedef Cvsip_tag type;
 80#else
 81  typedef typename Choose_solver_impl<
 82    Is_lud_impl_avail,
 83    T,
 84    Lud_type_list>::type type;
 85
 86  typedef typename ITE_Type<
 87    Type_equal<type, None_type>::value,
 88    As_type<Error_no_solver_for_this_type>,
 89    As_type<type> >::type use_type;
 90#endif
 91};
 92
 93} // namespace impl
 94
 95/// LU solver object.
 96
 97template <typename              T               = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE,
 98	  return_mechanism_type ReturnMechanism = by_value>
 99class lud;
100
101
102
103/// LU solver object (by-reference).
104
105template <typename T>
106class lud<T, by_reference>
107  : public impl::Lud_impl<T,typename impl::Choose_lud_impl<T>::use_type>
108{
109  typedef typename impl::Choose_lud_impl<T>::use_type use_type;
110  typedef impl::Lud_impl<T, use_type> base_type;
111
112  // Constructors, copies, assignments, and destructors.
113public:
114  lud(length_type length)
115    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
116      : base_type(length)
117    { VSIP_IMPL_COVER_TAG("lud", use_type); }
118
119  ~lud() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
120
121  // By-reference solvers.
122public:
123  template <mat_op_type tr,
124	    typename    Block0,
125	    typename    Block1>
126  bool solve(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, Matrix<T, Block1> x)
127    VSIP_NOTHROW
128  { return this->template impl_solve<tr, Block0, Block1>(b, x); }
129};
130
131
132
133/// LU solver object (by-value).
134
135template <typename T>
136class lud<T, by_value>
137  : public impl::Lud_impl<T,typename impl::Choose_lud_impl<T>::use_type>
138{
139  typedef impl::Lud_impl<T,typename impl::Choose_lud_impl<T>::use_type>
140	  base_type;
141
142  // Constructors, copies, assignments, and destructors.
143public:
144  lud(length_type length)
145    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
146      : base_type(length)
147    {}
148
149  ~lud() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
150
151  // By-value solvers.
152public:
153  template <mat_op_type tr,
154	    typename    Block0>
155  Matrix<T>
156  solve(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b)
157    VSIP_NOTHROW
158  {
159    Matrix<T> x(b.size(0), b.size(1));
160    this->template impl_solve<tr>(b, x); 
161    return x;
162  }
163};
164
165
166
167} // namespace vsip
